name: Elekid
flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

previous.name: Smoochum
previous.flavorText:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

next.name: Magby
next.flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

pokemon.name: Elekid
pokemon.flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.flavorText:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

pokemon.name: Electivire
pokemon.flavorText:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.
